entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late in the morning. Rain mixed with snow late in the morning and early afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
